attributes.action: Make a law that requires (absent) fathers to see their children!
attributes.additional_details: Many children are growing up emotionally damaged from the rejection and many unanswered questions they have when their father isn't around . It's time to end this cycle of emotional trauma for children!
attributes.background:
It's neglect when a mother doesn't take care of her child but why isn't it neglect when men don't? 
Paying child support will not support a child's emotional growth!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about non-resident parents who don't see their children, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
